column5: How could we manage without yer entertainin' input?  Oh well, you asked... dark tonight, clearin' by marnin'.
True, true. And what about diesel? I hear some VW's get 1300 km per tank!!
A coworker of mine spouse is a truck driver, he stated gas prices are suppose to go up 8 to 10 cents over night tonight.  So you may want to fill up tonight, you never know.
To Late - up to 111.9 here in St. Catharines - gone up just since supper time!   Don
I'd stock up at that price. $128.9 here.
Too late... been $1.12 here for weeks!
102.4  on the 401 near Brockville the other day

Oil was like 112 a barrel this morning, a new record high, and according to some experts no good reason for it to be that high, 60 to 80 dollar range was mentioned. High use season coming, let the price gouging begin?
Yeah, been that price for a week here, or close to it.  Thankfully I filled up last night.  Unfortunately, my car is lousy on gas!
$1.14 this AM.
$1.27 in downtown Mtl. this morning. Probably $1.23 here.....I haven't gotten out yet today.
$1.14 in Toronto

Im really depressed.  123.9 for a week and predictions 1.50.  Found out on the Radio that according to an expert, Eastern Canada and Western Canada have two different conversions to Calculate the pump price from the world market price.  GO FIGURE EH.    TOTALLY OUT OF CONTROL  OH YEA FCK ANY ENVIROMENTAL TAX
Another one bites the dust? Frontier Airlines filed for chapter 11 bankruptcy, cites high fuel costs.
Get used to it, heck plan on paying $1.50 to $2.00 a liter. We've been warned about this fer some time now, so why do we always act surprised?
It's like sex Clampit... you always wanted it, but still have that look of surprise when ever you get it! HH
..and I thought you were gonna say she keeps warning you the price is gonna go up Joe!
i'd be surprised if i was on the receiving end too!
1.23 here for a week now wonder how many batteries i can put in the boat and run the electric for the summer?
.and I thought you were gonna say she keeps warning you the price is gonna go up Joe! LOL Wayne, might have to run for governor to afford either?
Compared to Europe, we are cheap!
cmopared to europe, we drive 5x as much.
Shhh....next thing you know, hydro will go up too....
I'll keep going over to the states every week with the exchange rate the way it is I'm paying $0.85/litre
honda civic baby!  too bad it dont tow lil boats
also, the sun will come up tomorrow.  Any more predictions?  It will be hot in the summer, cold in the winter.

I'm not trying o start anything here, but we get what we deserve. We are willing to pay whatever they ask us to pay for gas. We can all complain about it but that will get us knowhere. I'm not posting this to be rude to anyone, just my opinion. Unless a large group could get together to boycott the gas companies we should snop complaining and get on with it. People should boycott different gas companies each week and see where it gets us. If people dont want to do something about it then do what I do, pay the price and just go fishing. Nothing we can do about it unless we are willing to take action.  Thats my 2 cents worth
